snippet.title: EARLY ACCESS RELEASE TRAILER!
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1030350/Kingdomfall/

Servers are ready, the game bug fixing is coming to an end, only the last preparations & some boring legal staff remains before the first early-access release!

The early-access version at release will have the following features:
1. 15 Default and 9 Legendary characters!
2. Basic combat system, with class differences for specific characters.
3. Weapon types: One-handed, Two-Handed, Polearm, Bow, Crossbow, Shields, Magic, Claws.
4. Maps: Lost Camp, Borderlands, Arena, Desert.
5. Game Modes: Duel, Team Deathmatch (Battle), Control, Freeplay.
6. Private server rent
7. In-battle gold looting mechanics 

Check out the other videos on this channel, they show many other features that may be added to the game after the early access release.

Links:

https://twitter.com/Kingdomfall_
https://www.indiedb.com/games/kingdomfall
https://discord.gg/Bn2ScFTv
